name: Creation & Destruction
loreDescription: A scissor-like weapon that can be used as two separate swords, forged by the greatest blacksmith at Lilibet's request. In mockery of the official religion of Rekos, the blades are named after Cho and Mal, the demons of creation and destruction.

skillDescription.base: 10% chance for skill cooldown not to occur.
skillDescription.max: 20% chance for skill cooldown not to occur.
